testcase.name: #deleteChore > When the list is not empty > When the chore exists > Delete the chore
#addChore > When adding a chore > When the chore already exists > Throw an exception
#addChore > When the deadline is invalid > Throw an exception
#addChore > When the description is invalid > Throw an exception
#deleteChore > When the list is not empty > When the chore does not exist > Throw an exception
#addChore > When the chore's list has at least one element > When adding a new chore > Add the chore
#addChore > When the chore's list is empty > When adding a new chore > Add the chore
#deleteChore > When the list is empty > Throw an exception
